item.title: Demo service with Servant
item.description: In a previous post I introduced and discussed about an open source library I authored called Servant. Servant is a framework for building RPC-style services with Python. Servant is to services as Django or Rails is to web applications…it’s framework you’d use when you need to build a service in Python. I’ll go a bit deeper in this post and show what it’s like to actually author and use a service.
